description.value:
Sustains user for 15 hours in the void. Includes Vox, Suit-patch kit, photo-visor, and clipharness + 10m of line. Gives Flyer (3) while in low/zero G environments. However -5 to Agility while wearing. 40% of breach if taking Rending/Explosive damage, can repair as full action with tape, etc.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
description.summary: Sustains user for 15 hours in the void. Includes Vox, Suit-patch kit, photo-visor, and clipharness + 10m of line. Gives Flyer (3) while in low/zero G environments. However -5 to Agility while wearing.
